message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it.  I'm really looking to get the product for closer to $9,500.  That's my best offer, let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $10,500.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
